explanation: [0-0] By a low stone wall along the river in a park, a man and a woman are sitting. The man, wearing a black down jacket and jeans, is looking at a tablet, while the woman, in a black down jacket and a pink hoodie, is looking at a laptop. To their right stands a red warning sign. On their left, a blind man wearing sunglasses, a gray top, and black pants, holding a cane, is facing the couple. Behind them, on the path, a person in a colorful coat is looking down at their phone. The scene shows a green lawn, benches by the lawn, and many buildings and trees in the distance.

[0-5] The man with the cane walks towards the couple sitting by the wall. His cane knocks the tablet out of the man's hand and into the water. Startled, the man pushes the woman's laptop into the water as well. At the same time, the person in the colorful coat notices them and looks over. The man with the cane, bent over, supports the man who dropped the devices. The camera then focuses on the tablet and laptop that fell into the water.

[5-14] The shot then cuts to show everyone in the scene. The person in the colorful coat walks to the riverbank, picks up their phone, and observes the three people. The man in the black down jacket is distraught, with his head in his hands, while the woman prepares to stand up. Then, the man in the down jacket stands up and lunges at the man with sunglasses, arms outstretched. Seeing this, the woman quickly stops the man and pulls the man with sunglasses away towards the lawn, asking him to leave. The person in the colorful coat puts away their phone and looks at the river. The man in the black down jacket squats by the river again, holding his head in his hands.

[14-17] The woman then walks to the squatting man, who bends down to try to retrieve the tablet and laptop from the water. At this moment, the man with sunglasses turns around, takes off his sunglasses, walks up to the couple, pats them on the shoulders, and gestures towards the camera.

[17-25] The couple then realizes that they are being filmed. The person in the colorful coat also walks over. The man with sunglasses opens his backpack and takes out a brand new laptop, handing it to the woman, who jumps up in delight. Behind her, the person in the colorful coat wears an astonished expression. The man in the black down jacket is stunned, mouth agape. Then, the man takes out a brand new tablet. The man in the black down jacket runs his hands through his hair in disbelief before accepting the tablet. Finally, the man in the black down jacket and the man with sunglasses hug each other joyfully.
